name: Ecigarettes
short_description:
Electronic Cigarette - Another Quit Smoking Gadget

Electronic cigarettes (also known as e-cigarettes and electric cigarettes)are the newest product on the market. They are made to look and feel like real smoking, even down to emitting unnatural smoke nonetheless they do not actually contain just about any tobacco. People inhale cigarette smoking vapour that looks like light up without any in the carcinogens found in tobacco smoke which are harmful to your smoker yet others around your ex.

The Electronic cigarette has a nicotine tube containing water nicotine. Whenever a user breathes in, a tiny powered by batteries atomizer turns handful of liquid pure nicotine into vapour. Inhaling smoking vapour gives the user any nicotine struck in seconds rather than minutes with patches or gum. If the user breathes in, a small Brought light at the tip of the electronic cigarette lights up orange to be able to simulate a genuine cigarette.
